sentences.sContent: He got lost and spent hours looking for the station, and anyway it was past midnight by the time he got home.
sentences.sCn: 他迷了路，找车站花了几个小时，总之过了午夜才到家。

sentences.sContent: Anyway, why didn’t you call the police?

synos.tran: 无论如何，不管怎样；总之

words.tran: 总之；无论如何；不管怎样

trans.tranOther: used when you are ignoring details so that you can talk immediately about the most important thing
